Header: The President will announce his decision about the presidential election after discussions
Content: General Secretary of the United Peoples Freedom Alliance MP Mahinda Amaraweera says that President Maithripala Sirisena will announce the way to work at the presidential election after discussions today. MP Mahinda Amaraweera said that the President was empowered to take a decision. He said that the President will make a statement tomorrow after consulting the relevant stakeholders. The Central Committee has expressed its views. Several discussions have been held at the leadership level. He said that the President was entrusted with the responsibility of taking a decision and informing them. He said that there is a possibility of the President himself making the statement. He said they have received a proposal to use the Pohottuwa symbol at the presidential election and the Chair symbol at the general election.
